column4: it seems my ubuntu install cd is borked.. I can still boot into the cd enviroment however, I now downloaded a new ubuntu iso to install, but I have no idea how Im going to burn an iso while being on the livecd
could you write a bootable USB drive?
I have an external usb hd available, yes
this might be helpful - i'm not an expert about this: http://unetbootin.sourceforge.net/
